data_inventory_description: This file contains a detailed inventory of all variables in the merged panel dataset. It is structured by variable category, based on the merged_panel_inventory.csv file.

variables.name: firm_ico
variables.description: Unique firm identifier (IČO – “IČO”)

variables.name: firm_name
variables.description: Legal name of company (“Název subjektu”)

variables.name: firm_main_nace
variables.description: Main NACE activity (CZ: “Hlavní NACE”)

variables.name: firm_main_nace_code
variables.description: Main NACE code (“Hlavní NACE – kód”)

variables.name: firm_sub_nace_cz
variables.description: Secondary NACE description (“Vedlejší NACE CZ”)

variables.name: firm_sub_nace_cz_code
variables.description: Secondary NACE code (“Vedlejší NACE CZ – kód”)

variables.name: firm_main_okec
variables.description: Main OKEČ classification (“Hlavní OKEČ”)

variables.name: firm_main_okec_code
variables.description: Main OKEČ code (“Hlavní OKEČ – kód”)

variables.name: firm_sub_okec
variables.description: Secondary OKEČ (“Vedlejší OKEČ”)

variables.name: firm_sub_okec_code
variables.description: Secondary OKEČ code (“Vedlejší OKEČ – kód”)

variables.name: firm_esa2010
variables.description: Institutional sector (ESA 2010)

variables.name: firm_esa95
variables.description: Institutional sector (ESA 95)

variables.name: firm_locality
variables.description: Municipality / Locality (“Lokalita”)

variables.name: firm_region
variables.description: Region (“Kraj”)

variables.name: firm_num_employees
variables.description: Number of employees (“Počet zaměstnanců”)

variables.name: firm_num_employees_cat
variables.description: dropped; Employee category (“Kategorie počtu zaměstnanců CZ”)

variables.name: firm_turnover_cat
variables.description: Turnover size category (“Kategorie obratu”)

variables.name: firm_audit
variables.description: Audit indicator (“Audit”)

variables.name: firm_consolidation
variables.description: Consolidation indicator (“Konsolidace”)

variables.name: firm_currency
variables.description: Reporting currency (“Měna”)

variables.name: firm_date_founded
variables.description: Date of incorporation (“Datum vzniku”)

variables.name: firm_date_dissolved
variables.description: Date of dissolution (“Datum zrušení”)

variables.name: firm_status
variables.description: Legal status (“Stav subjektu”)

variables.name: firm_legal_form
variables.description: Legal form (“Právní forma”)

variables.name: firm_entity_type
variables.description: Entity type (“Typ subjektu”)

variables.name: firm_year_founded
variables.description: Year of foundation (parsed from date)

variables.name: firm_year_dissolved
variables.description: Year of dissolution (parsed from date)

variables.name: firm_is_dissolved
variables.description: Dissolution status (derived)

variables.name: firm_other_liabilities
variables.description: Other liabilities (“Ostatní pasiva”), only last observation, not time-series (static)

variables.name: firm_current_assets
variables.description: Current assets (“Oběžná aktiva”), only last observation, not time-series (static)

variables.name: firm_total_liabilities
variables.description: Total liabilities (“Cizí zdroje”), only last observation, not time-series (static)

variables.name: firm_other_assets
variables.description: Other assets (“Ostatní aktiva”), only last observation, not time-series (static)

variables.name: firm_fixed_assets
variables.description: Fixed assets (“Stálá aktiva”), only last observation, not time-series (static)

variables.name: firm_sales_revenue
variables.description: Sales revenue (“Tržby, Výkony / Tržby Výkony”)

variables.name: firm_turnover
variables.description: Turnover (“Obrat, Výnosy / Obrat Výnosy”)

variables.name: firm_oper_profit
variables.description: Operating profit / EBIT (“Provozní hospodářský výsledek”)

variables.name: firm_profit_pre_tax
variables.description: Profit before tax (“Hospodářský výsledek před zdaněním”)

variables.name: firm_profit_net
variables.description: Net profit (“Hospodářský výsledek za účetní období”)

variables.name: firm_costs
variables.description: Total costs/expenses (“Náklady”)

variables.name: firm_total_assets
variables.description: Total assets (“Aktiva celkem”)

variables.name: firm_equity
variables.description: Equity (“Vlastní kapitál”)

variables.name: firm_total_liabilities_and_equity
variables.description: Liabilities & equity (“Pasiva celkem”)

variables.name: firm_operating_margin_cal
variables.description: oper_profit / sales_revenue (winsorised 0.5%)

variables.name: firm_net_margin_cal
variables.description: profit_net / sales_revenue (winsorised 0.5%)

variables.name: firm_roa_ebit_cal
variables.description: oper_profit / total_assets

variables.name: firm_roe_cal
variables.description: profit_net / equity

variables.name: firm_equity_ratio_cal
variables.description: equity / total_assets

variables.name: firm_cost_ratio_cal
variables.description: costs / sales_revenue (winsorised 0.5%)

variables.name: firm_effective_tax_rate_cal
variables.description: (profit_pre_tax - profit_net) / profit_pre_tax

variables.name: firm_asset_turnover_cal
variables.description: sales_revenue / total_assets

variables.name: firm_labor_productivity_cal
variables.description: sales_revenue / num_employees

variables.name: firm_operating_margin_cal_raw
variables.description: Raw calculated (not cleaned) margin - before winsorising

variables.name: firm_cost_ratio_cal_raw
variables.description: Raw calculated (not cleaned) cost ratio - before winsorising

variables.name: firm_net_margin_cal_raw
variables.description: Raw calculated (not cleaned) net margin - before winsorising

variables.name: firm_level1_code
variables.description: NACE 1st-level code (section, letter, e.g., "C")

variables.name: level2_code
variables.description: NACE 2nd-level code (2-digit, e.g., "25")

variables.name: firm_name_czso_en
variables.description: English name for NACE code

variables.name: level1_nace_en_name
variables.description: English name for NACE 1st-level code (section, letter, e.g., 'C')

variables.name: level2_nace_en_name
variables.description: English name for NACE 2nd-level code (2-digit, e.g., '25')

variables.name: firm_industry_flag
variables.description: Industrial sector flag (B,C,D,E=True)

variables.name: magnus_nace
variables.description: NACE code (Magnus formatting, as Magnus reported)

categories.category_name: 2. Sector-Level Variables (Prefix: sector_, joined via NACE/year)

variables.name: sector_level1_avg_wages_by_nace
variables.description: Average gross monthly wage in sector (NACE 1st-level granularity)
variables.unit: CZK / month, per FTE, annual avg, matched on nace_level1

variables.name: sector_level1_no_of_employees_by_nace
variables.description: Number of employees in sector (NACE 1st-level granularity)
variables.unit: Thousands of persons, matched on nace_level1

variables.name: sector_level1_ppi_by_nace
variables.description: Producer Price Index by NACE (NACE 1st-level granularity)

variables.name: sector_level2_avg_wages_by_nace
variables.description: Average gross monthly wage in sector (NACE 2nd-level granularity)
variables.unit: CZK / month, per FTE, annual avg, matched on nace_level2

variables.name: sector_level2_no_of_employees_by_nace
variables.description: Number of employees in sector (NACE 2nd-level granularity)
variables.unit: Thousands of persons, matched on nace_level2

variables.name: sector_level2_ppi_by_nace
variables.description: Producer Price Index by NACE (NACE 2nd-level granularity)

categories.category_name: 3. Macro-Level Variables (Prefix: mac_, joined by year)

variables.name: mac_cnb_repo_rate_annual
variables.description: CNB policy repo rate (annual time-weighted avg, “repo sazba”)

variables.name: mac_hicp_dec
variables.description: HICP (Harmonized CPI, Dec values), ICP.M.CZ.N.000000.4.ANR

variables.name: mac_hicp_overall_roc
variables.description: HICP – Overall index annual rate of change (headline inflation), ICP.A.CZ.N.000000.4.AVR

variables.name: mac_hicp_pure_energy_roc
variables.description: HICP – Electricity, gas, solid fuels & heat energy annual rate of change, ICP.A.CZ.N.ELGAS0.4.AVR

variables.name: mac_hicp_energy_full_roc
variables.description: HICP – Electricity, gas & other fuels annual rate of change, ICP.A.CZ.N.045000.4.AVR

variables.name: mac_nom_gr_avg_wage_czk
variables.description: Nominal gross average wage (CZK)

variables.name: mac_no_of_employees_ths
variables.description: No. of employees (national, ths)

variables.name: mac_gdp_nominal_prices
variables.description: Nominal GDP (“HDP v běžných cenách”)

variables.name: mac_gdp_2020_base_prices
variables.description: Real GDP (constant 2020 prices)

variables.name: mac_gdp_2020_base_prices_sopr
variables.description: Real GDP YoY volume index (SOPR)

variables.name: mac_deflator_nominal
variables.description: GDP deflator, YoY SOPR (same period LY)

variables.name: mac_deflator_base_2020
variables.description: GDP deflator, base 2020

variables.name: mac_unemp_rate
variables.description: Unemployment rate (“Míra nezaměstnanosti”)

variables.name: mac_fx_czk_eur_annual_avg
variables.description: CZK/EUR average annual exchange rate

variables.name: mac_import_price_index_ex_energy
variables.description: Import price index excl. energy (Laspeyres)

variables.name: mac_FBGSQ
variables.description: Net exports (% GDP, OECD code)

variables.name: mac_NLGXQ
variables.description: Gen. gov. primary balance (% GDP, OECD code)

variables.name: mac_GGFLMQ
variables.description: Gross public debt (Maastrich Criterion as a % GDP, OECD code)

variables.name: mac_RPMGS
variables.description: Rel. price of imports (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_IRS
variables.description: Short-term interest rate (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_IRL
variables.description: Long-term govt bond yield (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_GAP
variables.description: Output gap (% potential GDP, OECD code)

variables.name: mac_NOOQ
variables.description: Net one-offs, gen. gov. (% pot. GDP, OECD code) - crisis related fiscal events (bailouts, windfalls)

variables.name: mac_PCORE_YTYPCT
variables.description: Core inflation, YoY % (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_HRS
variables.description: Hours worked per worker (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_CPI_YTYPCT
variables.description: Headline CPI YoY % (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_UNR
variables.description: Unemployment rate, OECD code

variables.name: mac_EXCH
variables.description: CZK/USD exchange rate (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_MPEN
variables.description: Import penetration (% domestic demand, OECD code), note: Share of domestic demand met by imports

variables.name: mac_ULC
variables.description: Unit labour cost, total economy (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_PDTY
variables.description: Labour productivity (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_ULCDR
variables.description: Relative ULC, Czech vs. trade partners (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_EXCHEB
variables.description: Nominal effective exchange rate (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_TTRADE
variables.description: Terms of trade index (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_KTPV_ANNPCT
variables.description: Productive capital stock growth, % (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_CPV_ANNPCT
variables.description: Private final consumption growth, % (OECD code)

variables.name: mac_ITV_ANNPCT
variables.description: Gross fixed capital formation growth, % (OECD code)

variables.name: firm_costs_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Total costs/expenses

variables.name: firm_equity_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Equity

variables.name: firm_oper_profit_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Operating profit / EBIT

variables.name: firm_profit_net_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Net profit

variables.name: firm_profit_pre_tax_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Profit before tax

variables.name: firm_sales_revenue_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Sales revenue

variables.name: firm_total_assets_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Total assets

variables.name: firm_total_liabilities_and_equity_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Liabilities & equity

variables.name: firm_turnover_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Turnover

variables.description: Log YoY growth of Nominal effective exchange rate

variables.name: mac_PDTY_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Labour productivity

variables.name: mac_TTRADE_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Terms of trade index

variables.name: mac_ULCDR_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Relative ULC, Czech vs. trade partners

variables.name: mac_ULC_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Unit labour cost, total economy

variables.name: mac_deflator_base_2020_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of GDP deflator, base 2020

variables.name: sector_level1_avg_wages_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of average gross monthly wage in sector (NACE 1st-level)

variables.name: sector_level1_no_of_employees_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of number of employees in sector (NACE 1st-level)

variables.name: sector_level1_ppi_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of producer price index by NACE (NACE 1st-level)

variables.name: sector_level2_avg_wages_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of average gross monthly wage in sector (NACE 2nd-level)

variables.name: sector_level2_no_of_employees_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of number of employees in sector (NACE 2nd-level)

variables.name: sector_level2_ppi_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of producer price index by NACE (NACE 2nd-level)

variables.name: mac_fx_czk_eur_annual_avg_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of CZK/EUR average annual exchange rate

variables.name: mac_gdp_2020_base_prices_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Real GDP (constant 2020 prices)

variables.name: mac_gdp_nominal_prices_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Nominal GDP

variables.name: mac_import_price_index_ex_energy_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Import price index excl. energy

variables.name: mac_nom_gr_avg_wage_czk_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Nominal gross average wage

variables.name: sector_avg_wages_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Average gross monthly wage in sector

variables.name: sector_no_of_employees_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Number of employees in sector

variables.name: sector_ppi_by_nace_logyoy
variables.description: Log YoY growth of Producer Price Index by NACE

categories.category_name: 6. Transformed Variables: Difference in Percentage Points (_dpp)

variables.name: firm_cost_ratio_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Cost ratio

variables.name: firm_effective_tax_rate_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Effective tax rate

variables.name: firm_equity_ratio_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Equity ratio

variables.name: firm_net_margin_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Net margin

variables.name: firm_operating_margin_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Operating margin

variables.name: firm_roa_ebit_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in ROA (EBIT)

variables.name: firm_roe_cal_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in ROE

variables.name: mac_CPI_YTYPCT_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Headline CPI YoY %

variables.name: mac_CPV_ANNPCT_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Private final consumption growth, %

variables.name: mac_FBGSQ_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Net exports (% GDP)

variables.name: mac_GAP_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Output gap (% potential GDP)

variables.name: mac_GGFLMQ_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Gross public debt (% GDP)

variables.name: mac_IRL_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Long-term govt bond yield

variables.name: mac_IRS_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Short-term interest rate

variables.name: mac_ITV_ANNPCT_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Gross fixed capital formation growth, %

variables.name: mac_KTPV_ANNPCT_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Productive capital stock growth, %

variables.name: mac_MPEN_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Import penetration (% domestic demand)

variables.name: mac_NLGXQ_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Gen. gov. primary balance (% GDP)

variables.name: mac_NOOQ_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Net one-offs, gen. gov. (% pot. GDP)

variables.name: mac_PCORE_YTYPCT_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Core inflation, YoY %

variables.name: mac_UNR_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in Unemployment rate

variables.name: mac_cnb_repo_rate_annual_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in CNB policy repo rate

variables.name: mac_hicp_energy_full_roc_dpp
variables.description: YoY change in HICP – Electricity, gas & other fuels annual rate of change

variables.description: YoY change in Unemployment rate
